nodes.text: Kholemi Elaru was a book authored by Patijak Sonn. It was for sale in 23 BBY and was, for a time, the fourth best-selling book according to the CoCo Town Edition of the HoloNet News.

A ranking of the five best-selling books, from 23 BBY, including the number-four ranked Kholemi Elaru, appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 45 (2002), an in-universe website created to publicize the upcoming Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones film. Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens wrote the site content.
